sentences.en: A small brown fawn hopped across the trail in front of them.
sentences.cn: 一只棕色的小鹿蹦跳着穿过他们面前的那条小路。

sentences.en: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes or until golden brown.
sentences.cn: 在预热过的烤箱里烤25分钟，或烤成金黄色。

sentences.en: Doris Brown closed her eyes and lapsed into sleep.
sentences.cn: 多丽丝·布朗闭上眼睛，安然入睡。

sentences.en: Drop the slices into the oil and fry until golden brown.
sentences.cn: 将切片倒进油里，煎至金棕色。

sentences.en: Ernest Brown lives about a dozen blocks from where the riots began.
sentences.cn: 欧内斯特·布朗住在离骚乱发生处几个街区远的地方。

sentences.en: Give your brows extra definition with Outdoor Girl'sEyebrow Pencil in Brown.
sentences.cn: 用“户外女孩”品牌的棕色眉笔更加清晰地勾勒出眉形。

sentences.en: He was white, with brown shoulder-length hair and a moustache.
sentences.cn: 他是个白人，留着棕色的齐肩发并蓄着小胡子。

sentences.en: He wore brown corduroy pants and a white cotton shirt.
sentences.cn: 他身着棕色灯芯绒裤子和白色棉衬衫。

sentences.en: I felt her dark brown hair brushing the back of my shoulder.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到她深褐色的头发拂过我的肩。

sentences.en: the browns and greens of the landscape
The corridors there were painted chocolate-brown to shoulder height.
sentences.cn: 那里的走廊从地面到齐肩高的部分都漆成棕褐色。

sentences.en: The sand martin is a brown bird with white underneath.
sentences.cn: 崖沙燕是一种褐羽白腹的鸟。

sentences.en: The special cabinet committee comprises Mr Brown, Mr Mandelson, and Mr Straw.
sentences.cn: 特别内阁委员会包括布朗先生、曼德尔森先生和斯特劳先生。

sentences.en: There'll be an interview with Mr Brown after the news.
sentences.cn: 新闻过后播出的是对布朗先生的访谈。

sentences.en: they are getting browned off with the overtime.
sentences.cn: 他们正为加班而沮丧呢。

sentences.en: This particular model is available in brown, white, or grey.
sentences.cn: 这个型号的产品有棕色、白色和灰色的。

sentences.en: To his 19th-century peers, Robert Brown was the prince of botany.
sentences.cn: 对于19世纪的同行来说，罗伯特·布朗是植物学巨匠。

sentences.en: Vicky Brown arrived home to find the men disconnecting her microwave.
sentences.cn: 维基·布朗到家时发现那些人正在断开她微波炉的开关。

phrases.tran_cn: 褐色脂肪；[解剖]肩胛间腺
使沮丧，惹恼：使呈现或变得愤怒或恼怒
棕色调味酱，棕色调味料
褐斑病；烟草赤星病；褐色叶斑病

trans.tran_cn: 棕色的，被晒黑的，棕色皮肤的，（谷物）未去壳的
trans.tran_en: having the colour of earth, wood, or coffee
the colour of earth, wood, or coffee
the colour of earth, wood, or coffee
having the colour of earth, wood, or coffee
to heat food so that it turns brown, or to become brown by being heated
